#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 2010;
int test,n,m,f[maxn][maxn];
char s[maxn],w[maxn];
int main(){
    scanf("%d\n",&test);
    while (test--){
        scanf("%s\n",s+1);n=strlen(s+1);
        scanf("%s\n",w+1);m=strlen(w+1);
        for (int i=0; i<=n; i++) f[i][0]=i;
        for (int j=0; j<=m; j++) f[0][j]=j;
        for (int i=1; i<=n; i++)
        for (int j=1; j<=m; j++){
            f[i][j]=f[i-1][j]+1;
            f[i][j]=min(f[i][j],f[i][j-1]+1);
            if (s[i]==w[j]) f[i][j]=min(f[i][j],f[i-1][j-1]); else f[i][j]=min(f[i][j],f[i-1][j-1]+1);
        }
        printf("%d\n",f[n][m]);
    }
}
